name: Catchcard Ranger
description:
Catchcard Ranger is a game where you collect monster cards by shooting monsters with monster cards.

Controls:

  • Mouse Cursor: Aim
  • Left Mouse Click: Shoot

---

Ludum Dare 41 Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

  • Robert Desrosiers (@flyingflambe) : Game Developer
  • Matt Wiggers (@wiggy) : Sound Designer

Version 1.1 Changes:

  • UI Scaling Improvements
  • Reticle appears and mouse movement fixed
  • Audio fixed
  • Quit Game option works
